meanings.sent1: The apple with the wormiest hole was thrown away.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the apples, the wormiest one was found in the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The wormiest apple in the bunch made the worms have a party.
meanings.sent4: Her room was the wormiest, filled with hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The forest floor was covered in the wormiest leaves, perfect for composting.

meanings.sent1: This apple is wormier than the one I had yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The garden soil is wormier after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The wormier the apple, the happier the worms.
meanings.sent4: His excuses were wormier than a fishing tale.
meanings.sent5: The old book was wormier than anticipated, with pages falling apart.
